item.title: Case report: Challenges in diagnosis and treatment of Small bowel diverticulitis presenting with acute abdomen

item.title: Blind nasal intubation in temporomandibular joint ankylosis: A case report
item.description: Temperomandibular joint (TMJ) ankylosis is loss of joint movement that results from a union of the mandibular condyle to the base of the skull. item.title: Percutaneous drainage management of an abscess developed from conservatively treated retroperitoneal haematoma caused by acupuncture
item.description: With acupuncture treatment becoming a widely used technique in medicine to control chronic pain, there have been increasing reports on its associated complications. item.description: Epidural abscess is a rare condition, with increasing incidence, but still underdiagnosed. item.title: Methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus prostatic abscess in an American soldier
item.description: Prostatic abscess caused by methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) is rare with few previously reported cases. This appears to be the first identifiable report of a healthy, immunocompetent individual developing a community acquired prostatic abscess.
